title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 4
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Gameboy, a keyring, dogs, FairyTed, geometry, Warm Baths, sports, sailing, CareBears
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Hamish from Hawthorn talking about his Game Boy; Mike from Montrose and his keyring; Melissa from East Malvern adores her Dogs; The Monroe Family show us 'Fairy Ted' and a geometry book; Atlanta from Abbotsford recalls an idyllic spot called 'Warm Baths'; Nicholas from Doncaster East follows sports - a lot; Seth from both Istanbul and Ivanhoe talks about sailing; and Isobel from Hawthorn shows us her CareBears
